trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um host de designer para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um host designer, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe abstrata é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: A classe HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>em um host designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>propriedade fornece acesso para o designer da fonte de dados, se um for definido.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A>propriedade obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>propriedade determina se o controle deve processar suas listas de ação padrão para escolher e criar fontes de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A>método executa as ações que são necessárias para se conectar à fonte de dados atual.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> method creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>método cria uma nova fonte de dados para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>método vincula o controle associado que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe para uma fonte de dados de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A> method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A>método executa as ações que são necessárias para se desconectar da fonte de dados atual.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>método obtém uma fonte de dados que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A> method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>método constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.GetSampleDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é usado para remover propriedades da ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> de</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Executa as ações que são necessárias para se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectToDataSource method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: O método ConnectToDataSource desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexa esses eventos para a nova fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a connection to a new data source was performed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the old and new data source are the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma conexão para uma nova fonte de dados foi executada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a fonte de dados novos e antigos é os mesmos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new data source for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSource method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateDataSource exibe uma caixa de diálogo que pode ser usada para criar uma fonte de dados para o controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> de

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle associado à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method first sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> control to reference the design-time data source and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: O método DataBind primeiro define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>controle para fazer referência a fonte de dados de tempo de design e conjuntos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataBind calls back to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: A associação de dados chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>método do controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe para associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, it restores the original values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, ele restaura os valores originais da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro é o controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe que está associado este designer, ou uma cópia desse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> para associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso para o designer da fonte de dados, quando um é selecionado para associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados pode ser acessada usando a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ou o designer</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>, which implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O designer da fonte de dados do controle associado é derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>, que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The data source can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the designer or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados pode ser acessada usando a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controle associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ou o designer</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> que representa o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Executa as ações que são necessárias para se desconectar da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The DisconnectFromDataSource method disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O método DisconnectFromDataSource desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>eventos da fonte de dados atual.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma fonte de dados que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Por motivos de desempenho, é melhor usar uma fonte de dados predefinidos simples em tempo de design em vez de fonte de dados real para o controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> de

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados para controles derivados da interface de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma fonte de dados de exemplo que pode ser usada em tempo de design para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The sample data constructed by the GetSampleDataSource method has a single node with an empty path.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de exemplo criados pelo método GetSampleDataSource tem um único nó com um caminho vazio.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> interface que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados para controles derivados de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para a exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, the PreFilterProperties method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, o método PreFilterProperties cria propriedades de tempo de design para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementando uma coleção de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle deve processar padrão listas de ação, que contêm uma lista suspensa de ID de fonte de dados e tarefas relacionadas.

trans-unit.source: The default action lists for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner> class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Lista a ação padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>classe incluem um **Escolher fonte de dados** item de menu que tem uma lista suspensa da qual uma fonte de dados pode ser selecionada e quaisquer outros itens de ação na lista de ação do controle de fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a fonte de dados ação de controle de lista incluirá **configurar fonte de dados** e **atualizar esquema** itens de menu, embora eles não deve sempre estar presentes.

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen.
trans-unit.target: O **configurar fonte de dados** item de menu exibe uma caixa de diálogo que é apropriada para o tipo de escolhido de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a fonte de dados é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle, o **configurar fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo permite que você escolha um objeto comercial para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.
trans-unit.target: O **atualizar esquema** item de menu atualiza o esquema do designer aplicado pela fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
